Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.name: PersistentStoreOptions
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.abstract: Describes the initialization options for a persistent store.

Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.name: model
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.abstract: The model for the stack that the factory produces.

Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.name: options
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.abstract: A dictionary that specifies options for the store that the factory produces.

Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.name: init(model:options:)
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.abstract: Constructs a new CoreDataStackProvider instance with the specified model and options.

Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.name: createStack(onQueue:completion:)
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html#/s:14.abstract: Initializes a new CoreDataStack instance using the factory’s model and options.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: name
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The name of the Core Data model resource.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: bundle
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The bundle in which the model is located.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: storeType
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The type of the Core Data persistent store for the model.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: storeURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The file URL specifying the full path to the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: modelURL
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The file URL specifying the model file in the bundle specified by bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: databaseFileName
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The database file name for the store.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: managedObjectModel
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The managed object model for the model specified by name.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: needsMigration
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Queries the meta data for the persistent store specified by the receiver

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: init(name:bundle:storeType:)
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Constructs a new CoreDataModel instance with the specified name and bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: defaultDirectoryURL()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The default directory used to initialize a CoreDataModel.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: removeExistingStore()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Removes the existing model store specfied by the receiver.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: migrate()
Structs/CoreDataModel.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Progressively migrates the persistent store of the CoreDataModel based on mapping models found in the model’s bundle.

Structs/CoreDataModel.html.name: CoreDataModel

Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html.name: CoreDataStackProvider
Structs/CoreDataStackProvider.html.abstract: An instance of CoreDataStackProvider is responsible for creating instances of CoreDataStack.

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: SaveResult

Extensions/NSManagedObjectContext.html#/.name: saveAsync(completion:)

Enums/StoreType.html#/s:14JSQCoreDataKit.name: sqlite(_:)

Enums/ModelFileExtension.html.abstract: Describes a Core Data model file exention type based on the

Enums/MigrationError.html.name: MigrationError
Enums/MigrationError.html.abstract: An error type that specifies possible errors that are thrown by calling CoreDataModel.migrate() throws.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: StackResult
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Describes the result type for creating a CoreDataStack.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: mainContext
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The main managed object context for the stack, which operates on the main queue.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: backgroundContext
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The background managed object context for the stack, which operates on a background queue.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: storeCoordinator
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: The persistent store coordinator for the stack. Both contexts are connected to this coordinator.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: childContext(concurrencyType:mergePolicyType:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Creates a new child context with the specified concurrencyType and mergePolicyType.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.name: reset(onQueue:completion:)
Classes/CoreDataStack.html#/s:14JSQCoreD.abstract: Resets the managed object contexts in the stack on their respective threads.

Classes/CoreDataStack.html.name: CoreDataStack
Classes/CoreDataStack.html.abstract: An instance of CoreDataStack encapsulates the entire Core Data stack.
